long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crossy Zombie is a thrilling survival game where you must navigate through a post-apocalyptic world overrun by hordes of the undead. Inspired by classic arcade gameplay, youâ€™ll guide your character across dangerous roads, rivers, and zombie-infested zones, all while avoiding deadly traps and obstacles. With every step, the challenge intensifies as zombies become faster and more numerous. Collect power-ups, unlock new characters, and see how far you can go before the relentless undead catch up. Will you make it across or become just another zombie snack?
